scenario_text.value:
We’re looking for Miu. If you know where she
is, could you please tell us?

Her Majesty is hiding somewhere inside this
castle.

Please! We have to find her before she gets
taken away! We want to protect her!
Won’t you tell us where she is?
I... I’ve told you all I know! Really!

Now I have other things to do, so could you
leave? Here, I’ll give you this, just go!

Coming back here isn’t going to change
anything! I’m busy! Get out!
